text: haey nowpel delke sautr nouv ayeat da chbasaleasa robsa yeung aoy puokke sdab pelnoh kar aahang robsa puokke kmean avei krawpi niyeay tha chaur puok anak( mou ha meat ning anak mean chomnue)noam chidaunchitea robsa puok yeung( del ban slab) aoy tralbmokvinh meul brasenbae puok anakchea anak niyeay pit noh
